name: Worlds Below
description:
Play as a little kiwi, and with your trusty grappling hook, go on an adventure to the deepest depths of the darkest cave. But be aware of any dangers within...

The controls are:

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Space/Up/W to jump

Left mouse button to grapple

I'm pretty pleased with how this game came out myself - mostly because I finished it! It's not too technically interesting or mechanically unique, but it was fun to make, and I hope you have fun playing it. The graphics were a bit of a nightmare to get working and wrangle into something looking nice, although they've grown on me as I've developed the game. I'd love to know what time you got too - I got around 160s on most of my playthroughs, but I'm curious how that compares to everyone else's! Hope you enjoy!
